name: Hortênsia
description:
"Hydrangea" 

The flower is often associated with women and femininity. I don't know when this started or where they got this idea, but to me it doesn't make sense. 

Appreciating the beauty of flowers, caring for them and growing them is a human being's job, people who understand plants are better people.

Painting in acrylic paint and shade a gate.
2021 - Brasil
3380x4200
7,39
